reviewText: Actually this DVD is just fine-and not defective-if you are playing it on a region 2 DVD player ((as it is stated in the product title/description)).  It is imported from the UK...and therefore formatted for UK DVD players or other region 2 countries. The USA falls under region 1...
We'll I got the movie and my son was so exited but,the movie will not work on any of are DVD players!!!!! So it's a big wast of money!!!!!!
